title: WTF What the Font HELP ME please
content:
Hello,  
I was referred here by the experts at Myfont, “What the font” forum site.  
Can anyone identify the font AND the fleuron used in this Monogram?  
Thank you in advance for any help  
Heather

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073817im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Monogram1_6399.jpg)

 [‹ Help with these handwritten fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45627 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anyone know where to find more fonts of this genre ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45610 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sugarsmacks

comments.content:
Sorry cant help with the ID, love the ornament though, but first time I have seen the usage of ’wtf’ in these forums... made me smile.

\_\_  
Rez
